strings.roomAlreadyExists: :warning: You already have a room summoned somewhere!
strings.roomRevokedInactive: Your channel was revoked due to inactivity, You can resummon it with `$1`
strings.roomErrorDisabled: Private rooms are disabled on this server.
strings.roomErrorLimit: Sorry, You cannot create a private room right now.
strings.roomErrorNotAllowed: You are currently now allowed to create a room.
strings.roomRenameDisabled: Renaming is disabled for this server.
strings.roomNoNameSpecified: You need to specify a name!
strings.revokeError: :no_good: Something went wrong while revoking your room.
strings.revokeNotGuild: You can only revoke your room from a server.
strings.roomMadePublic: Anyone can now join your room.
strings.roomNotPublic: Only added members can join your room now.
strings.userWhitelistRevoke: $1 is no longer on your whitelist.
strings.userBlacklistRevoke: $1 is no longer on your blacklist.
strings.errorConfigNotFound: Something went wrong while fetching this servers configuration.
strings.errorRoomsDisabled: Private Rooms are disabled on this server.
strings.errorNotGuild: Rooms can only be summoned from a server.
